scripts.build: webpack --config webpack.dev.js && rm -rf public && mkdir -p public/build && cp -r assets public && cp dist/* public
scripts.build-prod: rm -rf public && webpack --config webpack.prod.js && cp -r assets public && cp dist/index.html public && cp dist/CNAME public && cp dist/favicon.png public
scripts.distribute: npm run distzip && cd public && surge
scripts.distzip: npm run build-prod && rm -f kaikkiroudaa.zip && zip kaikkiroudaa.zip -r public
